meanings.definition: To decorate or adorn something with various ornaments or decorations.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed bedecking her room with colorful posters.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, people love bedecking their homes with lights and garlands.
meanings.sent3: The cat surprised everyone by bedecking itself with shiny ribbons.
meanings.sent4: The garden was bedecked with a blanket of vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent5: The princess's gown was bedecked with sparkling jewels.

meanings.definition: The act of covering or adorning something with decorative items.
meanings.sent1: The bedecking of the Christmas tree brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent2: The bedecking of the stage added a festive touch to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The bedecking of the cake with candles made it look like a mini firework display.
meanings.sent4: The bedecking of the parade float made it the most eye-catching in the procession.
meanings.sent5: The bedecking of the classroom for the party created a cheerful atmosphere.
